name: Flappy Bugs
description:
Flappy Bird Recreation :) 

A game created in Tinker Studios.

At Tinker Studios, Greenwich we created our first project of making a game on Unity - a recreation of flappy bird using Tinker Studios original logo/mascot.

Any donations will go to the club to help support the making of more games in our very young and new community start-up. This will allow us to continue to produce more content for more and more people. Anybody interested in joining can also join us as we work remotely.
